definition: to pass/to spend (time)/measure/limit/extent/degree of intensity/degree (angles, temperature etc)/kilowatt-hour/classifier for events and occurrences

pinyin: guo2 jia1 lu:3 you2 du4 jia4 qu1

sentences.english: Girne promises its guests a cosy atmosphere and an enjoyable vacation.
sentences.chinese: 裸山旅遊度假區，保證爲客人提供難忘的時代。

sentences.english: One is a federal-level tourist resort, "Baikal harbor."
sentences.chinese: 其中一個是屬於聯邦級旅遊度假區“貝加爾港灣”。

sentences.english: It is also a national forest park.
sentences.chinese: 飛龍湖旅遊度假區還是國家級森林公園。

sentences.english: The government has targeted Sanya and Yalong Bay as major resorts areas.
sentences.chinese: 政府的目標是把三亞和亞龍灣發展成重要的度假區。

sentences.english: Yalong Bay is an international holiday resort now.
sentences.chinese: 亞龍灣現在是一個國際旅遊度假區。

sentences.english: Fellow friends, what now we are at now is the Yalong country traveling resort area.
sentences.chinese: 各位朋友，現在我們所在的是亞龍灣國家旅遊度假區。

sentences.english: At instances two even more northern counties namely, Schoharie and Otsego are also integrated in regional holiday area of Catskills.
sentences.chinese: 在情況下兩個更北縣也整合在區域度假區卡茨基爾的。

sentences.english: Hotel was built as part of Spa and Golf resort Saint Martin.
sentences.chinese: 該酒店爲聖馬丁溫泉和高爾夫度假區的一部分。

sentences.english: Tiantai Hot Spring Resort mountain and sea, beautiful environment, perfect facilities.
sentences.chinese: 天泰溫泉度假區依山傍海，環境優美，設施完善。

definition: Binhai (place name)/Binhai New District, subprovincial district of Tianjin/Binhai county in Yancheng 鹽城|盐城[Yan2 cheng2], Jiangsu/fictitious city Binhai in political satire/Primorsky, a territory in the far east of Russia
a hot tourist attraction/a tourist trap
name of various places including Gold Coast (Australian city), Gold Coast (former British colony in Africa) and Costa Daurada (area on the coast of Catalonia, Spain)
site developed for a group of related enterprises/(industrial or technology) park
